name: CarrierOfPredominantlySexuallyTransmittedInfection
title: Carrier of Predominantly Sexually Transmitted Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  exposure to infections primarily transmitted through sexual contact.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of potential exposure to infection with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis of sexually transmitted infections.)

concept.display: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to infections with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission
Carrier of infections with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission

contains.display: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to infections with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission
Carrier of infections with a predominantly sexual mode of transmission
